title: Elizabeth Warren signals she could support Donald Trump's labor secretary pick
shortDescription: Sen. Elizabeth Warren, D-Mass., signaled that she may back Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer, R-Ore., for labor secretary.

title: Biden isn't the first president to pardon family
shortDescription: Joe Biden is the third president to pardon a family member. He's the first to pardon a relative before a sentence has been served.

title: Biden arrives in Angola for long-awaited Africa trip
shortDescription: President Joe Biden arrived in Angola on a long-promised visit to Sub-Saharan Africa. The visit will focus on a US-backed rail project and the legacy of slavery.

title: California begins planning how to 'Trump-proof' the state
shortDescription: California lawmakers returned to the state capital ahead of a special session called by Democratic Gov. Gavin Newsom to 'Trump-proof' the liberal state for the second term of the conservative president-elect.

title: Who has Trump picked for his Cabinet? Here's what to know
shortDescription: President Elect Donald Trump named Kash Patel to potentially lead the FBI. The nomination would require Trump to fire current Director Christopher Wray, whom he named to the post in his first term.

title: Trump to visit Paris in first trip abroad since winning U.S. election
shortDescription: Donald Trump will make his first trip abroad since winning the 2024 election â€” a visit to Paris for the reopening of Notre-Dame Cathedral.

title: Video doesn't show Biden wandering off in Amazon | Fact check
shortDescription: The full footage of Biden's remarks shows him entering and exiting via the same path. Several other people followed the same route while leaving.

title: Trump warns of 'hell to pay' if Hamas does not release all hostages
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump pledged to exact vengeance unless Hamas militants release every Israeli hostage before his inauguration in January.

title: Bannon, Kushner, Manafort: Trump's major pardons from his first term
shortDescription: During his first term in office, Trump granted 144 pardons, which included distant family members, some of his closest allies and others.

title: Will Supreme Court give Trump a chance to `save flavored vapes'?
shortDescription: Food and Drug Administration has rejected more than a million vaping products flavored to taste like fruit, candy or desserts.

title: 'Of course': Jill Biden says she supports presidential pardon of Hunter
shortDescription: Jill Biden told reporters she 'of course' supports President Joe Biden's decision to pardon Hunter Biden, who has been convicted of felonies.

title: Trump didn't order woman's arrest in JFK assassination | Fact check
shortDescription: The social media user who first shared it identified it as a fabrication in a later post.

title: Hunter Biden's pardon is 'very unusual,' experts say
shortDescription: Legal experts said President Joe Biden's pardon of his son Hunter was broad and unusual for not specifying the crimes he was being shielded from.

title: Trump picks Brooke Rollins to be agriculture secretary
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday chose Brooke Rollins, president of the America First Policy Institute, to be Secretary of Agriculture.

title: Trump wants clean slate for Jan. 6 rioters after Hunter Biden pardon
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump didn't criticize the Hunter Biden pardon, but he said defendants in the Jan. 6 Capitol Riot deserved pardons as well.

title: What was Hunter Biden convicted of? What to know after presidential pardon
shortDescription: Hunter Biden has been convicted of federal gun charges and federal tax evasion charges. President Joe Biden pardoned his son alleging an unfair process.

title: Daily Briefing: A pardon for Hunter Biden
shortDescription: The president's change of tone on a pardon for his son. Here is the news to know on Monday.
